# maximumMessageSize

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of bytes to buffer before the receive call fails with an error.

## Declaration

```swift
var maximumMessageSize: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

This value includes the sum of all bytes from continuation frames. Receive calls will fail once the task reaches this limit.

## Sending and receiving data

- **send(_:completionHandler:)**: Sends a WebSocket message, receiving the result in a completion handler.
- **URLSessionWebSocketTask.Message**: An enumeration of the types of messages sent and received.
- **receive(completionHandler:)**: Reads a WebSocket message once all the frames of the message are available.
